original_title: The Fans Who Make Football: Boca Juniors FC
overview: Argentina’s capital Buenos Aires has the largest concentration of football clubs in the world. The most famous is Boca Juniors, having most of Argentina’s population as loyal fanatics. This documentary follows Boca Junior super-fans as they reveal how and why they became the voice for the common man and woman.
title: The Fans Who Make Football: Boca Juniors FC
